PS C:\> Get-LbryChannel
address : bTftAkLNgRPYbjbFXLPzhWedBBsZaHjs92 amount : 10.0 blocks_to_expiration : 242893 can_sign : True category : claim claim_id : 14fb8167f5f17fca40e59c6276d900c2ed53188c confirmations : 20081 decoded_claim : True expiration_height : 446751 expired : False has_signature : False height : 183777 hex : 08011002225e0801100322583056301006072a8648ce3d020106052b8104000a03420004bb24333144c6c95d68987de2 ef4633b20b1350d5274f4fa17d8f5edaca0f2626df1797af581faa5576df78e5baeafc4adb2fa2a8f027d8ab5055fa9c 7bd26c71 is_pending : False is_spent : False name : @maynardjames nout : 1 txid : 9f5336c1232cc05f2d5b26261e2b04c39d6690e042d3c5d39fbdd203009251eb value : @{certificate=; claimType=certificateType; version=_0_0_1}

maml:description.maml:para: Gets claim information for personal claims, claims for a name or claims for a channel
Get claims for a name. Combine with Nout to get specific claim for a name.
look for claim with this nout
look for claim with this txid
look for claim with this claim_id
which page of results to return where page 1 is the first page, defaults to no pages
number of results in a page, default of 10
Get claims for a name. Combine with Nout to get specific claim for a name.
look for claim with this nout
look for claim with this txid
look for claim with this claim_id
which page of results to return where page 1 is the first page, defaults to no pages
number of results in a page, default of 10
(list) list of supports [{'txid': txid,'nout': nout,'amount': amount}]
(int) claim index number in sorted list of claims which assert to be part of the channel
(bool) whether or not the claim value was decoded
ClaimDict if decoded, otherwise hex string
(list) supports without any claims attached to them
(int) the height of last takeover for the name
[Mine]: (int) number of blocks until it expires
[Mine]: (int) number of blocks of confirmations for the claim
[Mine]: (int) the block height which the claim will expire
[Mine]: (bool) true if claim is abandoned, false otherwise

command:example.maml:title: EXAMPLE 1: gets a spefic claim for a name
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-LbryClaim -Name tncb -Nout 1
address : bTj7ahNXTdiuEgjiGwSaTu6mtP8Xeccj8M amount : 10.0 channel_name : @maynardjames claim_id : db2005620c01d4b37add7eb09c85b1f111f5b88b claim_sequence : 1 decoded_claim : True depth : 20098 effective_amount : 11.1 has_signature : True height : 183777 hex : 080110011aab0108011264080410011a16546865204e657874204361726f6c204275726e65747422002a00320038004224 080110011a1955ba28538e55d135675d275f6bfd8e028b62db483e1625d95e25000000004a1468747470733a2f2f737065 652e63682f544e434252005a001a41080110011a30434ea1eccb4f786aea8b84d7500d9e8656c8885026eaaca853596f04 32373f5fef9a0be01548d6f0f7fa7489f9c0b7ec2209766964656f2f6d70342a5c080110031a401138675cb19a7bda0fd4 e8a02e97477b951b70fd35f9c0b860f821c3562bc82fad17855d8bf077d03724419d9fa9f19285f379cc6c097d86de5cb3 f80e924fdc221414fb8167f5f17fca40e59c6276d900c2ed53188c name : tncb nout : 1 signature_is_valid : True supports : {@{amount=1.0; nout=1; txid=9af62ef7901edb092d1b47e8d7af8ddfd4f5f4a16acfec56ab1590b987fca716}, @{amount=0.1; nout=0; txid=d3342b71738a04746345fa094bed02a627bd6b92cb3975cfe2fa31b509ebd092}} txid : 6e6fdb6c2c206618ab6f532c9753cf67e85777a3d90575e1d39ddcbeac51f9bd value : @{claimType=streamType; publisherSignature=; stream=; version=_0_0_1}

command:example.maml:title: EXAMPLE 2: get all claims for a channel uri
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-LbryClaim -ChannelUri "@maynardjames"
absolute_channel_position : 0 address : bTj7ahNXTdiuEgjiGwSaTu6mtP8Xeccj8M amount : 10.0 channel_name : @maynardjames claim_id : db2005620c01d4b37add7eb09c85b1f111f5b88b claim_sequence : 1 decoded_claim : True depth : 20097 effective_amount : 11.1 has_signature : True height : 183777 name : tncb nout : 1 signature_is_valid : True supports : {@{amount=1.0; nout=1; txid=9af62ef7901edb092d1b47e8d7af8ddfd4f5f4a16acfec56ab1590b987fca716}, @{amount=0.1; nout=0; txid=d3342b71738a04746345fa094bed02a627bd6b92cb3975cfe2fa31b509ebd092}} txid : 6e6fdb6c2c206618ab6f532c9753cf67e85777a3d90575e1d39ddcbeac51f9bd valid_at_height : 183777 value : @{claimType=streamType; publisherSignature=; stream=; version=_0_0_1}

maml:description.maml:para: (dict) Dictionary of daemon settings See ADJUSTABLE_SETTINGS in lbrynet/conf.py for full list of settings

command:example.maml:title: EXAMPLE 1: gets LBRY daemon settings. (There are no parameters for this command)
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-LbryDaemon
allowed_origin : api_host : localhost api_port : 5279 cache_time : 150 check_ui_requirements : True data_dir : C:\Users\maynardjames\AppData\Roaming\lbrynet data_rate : 0.0001 default_ui_branch : master delete_blobs_on_remove : True dht_node_port : 4444 download_directory : C:\Downloads download_timeout : 180 host_ui : True is_generous_host : True known_dht_nodes : {lbrynet1.lbry.io 4444, lbrynet2.lbry.io 4444, lbrynet3.lbry.io 4444} last_version : @{lbrynet=0.13.1; lbryum=2.8.4} lbryum_wallet_dir : C:\Users\maynardjames\AppData\Roaming\lbryum local_ui_path : max_connections_per_stream : 5 max_download : 0.0 max_key_fee : @{address=; amount=25.0; currency=USD} max_search_results : 25 max_upload : 0.0 min_info_rate : 0.02 min_valuable_hash_rate : 0.05 min_valuable_info_rate : 0.05 peer_port : 3333 peer_search_timeout : 3 pointtrader_server : http://127.0.0.1:2424 reflect_uploads : True reflector_port : 5566 reflector_servers : {reflector.lbry.io 5566} run_on_startup : False run_reflector_server : False sd_download_timeout : 3 search_servers : {lighthouse1.lbry.io:50005} search_timeout : 5.0 share_usage_data : True startup_scripts : {} ui_branch : master use_auth_http : False use_upnp : True wallet : lbryum

command:example.maml:title: EXAMPLE 1: shows how to get file information from claim name
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-LbryFile -Name tncb
channel_name : @maynardjames claim_id : db2005620c01d4b37add7eb09c85b1f111f5b88b completed : True download_directory : C:\Downloads download_path : C:\Downloads\The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 file_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 has_signature : True key : 3e209a35fb6994ed42ef1f93de1211a3 message : metadata : @{claimType=streamType; publisherSignature=; stream=; version=_0_0_1} mime_type : video/mp4 name : tncb outpoint : 6e6fdb6c2c206618ab6f532c9753cf67e85777a3d90575e1d39ddcbeac51f9bd:1 points_paid : 0.0 sd_hash : 434ea1eccb4f786aea8b84d7500d9e8656c8885026eaaca853596f0432373f5fef9a0be01548d6f0f7fa7489f9c0b7ec signature_is_valid : True stopped : True stream_hash : 85e43f3944ea04ccbdeaae9523d759c53268a9a3562be91c9fcffba7b97e13fd655c1ec5ef8e7867b841fc96e08b0a99 stream_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 suggested_file_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 total_bytes : written_bytes : 51528645

channel_name : @maynardjames claim_id : db2005620c01d4b37add7eb09c85b1f111f5b88b completed : True download_directory : C:\Downloads\ download_path : C:\Downloads\The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 file_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 has_signature : True key : 3e209a35fb6994ed42ef1f93de1211a3 message : Started The Next Carol Burnett.mp4, got 25/25 blobs, stream status: completed metadata : @{claimType=streamType; publisherSignature=; stream=; version=_0_0_1} mime_type : video/mp4 name : tncb outpoint : 6e6fdb6c2c206618ab6f532c9753cf67e85777a3d90575e1d39ddcbeac51f9bd:1 points_paid : 0.0 sd_hash : 434ea1eccb4f786aea8b84d7500d9e8656c8885026eaaca853596f0432373f5fef9a0be01548d6f0f7fa7489f9c0b7ec signature_is_valid : True stopped : True stream_hash : 85e43f3944ea04ccbdeaae9523d759c53268a9a3562be91c9fcffba7b97e13fd655c1ec5ef8e7867b841fc96e08b0a99 stream_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 suggested_file_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 total_bytes : 51528672 written_bytes : 51528645

maml:description.maml:para: gets JSON content in the LBRY API

command:example.maml:title: EXAMPLE 1: This shows how to get the results from json content for the "file_list" method
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-LbryJsonContent -Method file_list -Params @{name="tncb"; fullstatus=$true}
channel_name : @maynardjames claim_id : db2005620c01d4b37add7eb09c85b1f111f5b88b completed : True download_directory : C:\Downloads download_path : C:\Downloads\The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 file_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 has_signature : True key : 3e209a35fb6994ed42ef1f93de1211a3 message : metadata : @{claimType=streamType; publisherSignature=; stream=; version=_0_0_1} mime_type : video/mp4 name : tncb outpoint : 6e6fdb6c2c206618ab6f532c9753cf67e85777a3d90575e1d39ddcbeac51f9bd:1 points_paid : 0.0 sd_hash : 434ea1eccb4f786aea8b84d7500d9e8656c8885026eaaca853596f0432373f5fef9a0be01548d6f0f7fa7489f9c0b7ec signature_is_valid : True stopped : True stream_hash : 85e43f3944ea04ccbdeaae9523d759c53268a9a3562be91c9fcffba7b97e13fd655c1ec5ef8e7867b841fc96e08b0a99 stream_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 suggested_file_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 total_bytes : written_bytes : 51528645

command:example.maml:title: EXAMPLE 1: downloads the stream given the URI
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-LbryStream -Uri tncb
channel_name : @maynardjames claim_id : db2005620c01d4b37add7eb09c85b1f111f5b88b completed : True download_directory : C:\Downloads download_path : C:\Downloads\The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 file_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 has_signature : True key : 3e209a35fb6994ed42ef1f93de1211a3 message : Started The Next Carol Burnett.mp4, got 25/25 blobs, stream status: completed metadata : @{claimType=streamType; publisherSignature=; stream=; version=_0_0_1} mime_type : video/mp4 name : tncb outpoint : 6e6fdb6c2c206618ab6f532c9753cf67e85777a3d90575e1d39ddcbeac51f9bd:1 points_paid : 0.0 sd_hash : 434ea1eccb4f786aea8b84d7500d9e8656c8885026eaaca853596f0432373f5fef9a0be01548d6f0f7fa7489f9c0b7ec signature_is_valid : True stopped : True stream_hash : 85e43f3944ea04ccbdeaae9523d759c53268a9a3562be91c9fcffba7b97e13fd655c1ec5ef8e7867b841fc96e08b0a99 stream_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 suggested_file_name : The Next Carol Burnett.mp4 total_bytes : 51528672 written_bytes : 51528645

confirmations : 29955 date : 2017-05-13 12:26 label : timestamp : 1494696393 txid : d09f4c9a0bc55fc5f23e40ada159aeb9eb34acec16261a82a2d6f8ea18b97aa6 value : 20.0
